QuestData.Title: Vouchsafe Our Arrival
QuestData.Description: A matter of great importance has arisen. While you were away, Archmage Khadgar contacted me.$B$BHe is investigating demonic influences to the north.$B$BBeing a human, the Frostwolves will not accept Khadgar without you there to vouch for him, nor will they accept a night elf such as myself.$B$BI will wait for you outside Throm'var in the Frostwind Crag.
QuestData.LogDescription: Meet Cordana Felsong outside of Thom'var in the Frostwind Crag.
QuestData.RewardText: Thank you for coming, $n. The archmage and I are in need of your assistance.
